properties.name: management.endpoint.camelroutes.read-only
properties.description: Whether Camel Routes actuator is in read-only mode. If not in read-only mode then operations to start/stop routes would be enabled.

properties.name: management.endpoint.camelroutes.enabled
properties.description: To turn on or off information about Camel Routes via actuator endpoint.

properties.name: management.endpoint.camelroutecontroller.enabled
properties.description: To turn on or off information about Camel Route Controller via actuator endpoint.
